title: Fantasy V & VI - Game Music Pack - Orchestral, RPG, Cinematic, VGM
description: Made exclusively for RPGs, Adventure and Fantasy games, Fantasy V & VI is a Game Music pack that brings life to your games.
longDescription:
From normal heroes who want to save the village, to talking animals that need to bring justice to a kingdom. Fantasy V & VI is made for those stories that we all love.


Listen to the soundtrack packs here:

- Fantasy V

- Fantasy VI


What’s inside:




Fantasy V:


What’s Inside:

– 9 original high-quality music

– 9 original high-quality music loops

– 18 total files

– Unlimited Royalty Free License




Fantasy VI:


What’s Inside:

– 9 original high-quality music

– 9 original high-quality music loops

– 18 total files

– Unlimited Royalty Free License


Tracklist:




Fantasy V:


(00:00) 01 - Peace is Forced

(00:48) 02 - At Last an Answer

(01:30) 03 - At last an Answer (Short Version)

(02:18) 04 - Aware of Changes

(03:00) 05 - Aware of Changes (Alt Version)

(03:39) 06 - Rescue

(04:27) 07 - Rescue (Alt Version 1)

08 - Rescue (Alt Version 2)

09 - Rescue (Alt Version 3)




Fantasy VI:


(00:00) 01 - Unscratched Soul

(00:48) 02 - Unscratched Soul (Piano Version)

(01:30) 03 - Hidden Shop

(02:18) 04 - Calm as the Ocean

(03:00) 05 - Calm as the Ocean (Alt Version)

(03:39) 06 - Little Boy

(04:27) 07 - Unnecessary Side Quests

(05:50) 08 - Unnecessary Side Quests (Short Version)

(05:45) 09 - Windwaker



(All file formats are in WAV, Stereo, 44.8kHz, 32bit)


With these game music/soundtrack packs, you also:

– Sounds great in any device: All music themes and stingers are fully mixed and mastered for seamless playback on any device.

– Avoid incongruent volumes: All themes and stingers are mastered for consistent volume throughout the soundtrack.

– Repeat music seamlessly: All music themes are fully loop-able, allowing for uninterrupted gameplay.


About composer:

Lufus is a music producer and composer known for creating the Original Soundtracks for multi-million downloaded games, including:


Support & help:

If you need help downloading these soundtrack/music packs, feel free to reach out to iamlufus@gmail.com
